root.name: Rigonauts
root.description: StoryIn Rigonauts you play the mechanic that plans and engineers his own machines and battles his way though 30 levels fighting enemy constructs. Throughout the game you will be able to upgrade your vessel with armor, new weapons and balloons. The goal of the game is to survive with your construct and ultimately defeat the boss at the end of the game, thus proving your construct is the best.Rigonauts is produced by Bay Area indie duo Engient.PC System RequirementsOS: Microsoft® Windows® XP with SP2 / Vista / 7Processor: Intel® Pentium™ 4 2.4 GHz or betterMemory: 512 MB RAMHard Disk Space: 250 MBVideo Card: Any OpenGL 2.0 graphics card with 256MB+ video RAMDirect X®: DirectX® 9.0c
